attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app is horrible and I do not recommend downloading it. I got the app so I could keep up with our president but it just sent ICE to my house. They took me to Antarctica and forced me to dance around the fire. There were monkeys everywhere and I had to fend for myself after they abandoned me in the ocean. Cat Noir managed to find me and he took me to Mars. We were safe until the police walked up where we were and we had to escape our safe haven. We met Bakugo and he blew up the police but it wasnâ€™t enough. They captured him and took him to the president. He wanted to murder him but I pleaded to take his place. I did persuade him to switch us but he decided to hang me by my hair and made me swing around the White House. It was terrible until the Avengers saved me. We lived somewhere remote until it all passed. The app is also incredibly glitchy and it kicked me out because I am not white. Very disgusting, I thought you said â€˜All Lives Matterâ€™. But overall, I highly recommend to not download this app.

Once I install this app it almost hacked everything personal or anything else on my device and I donâ€™t feel like that was OK, because once I deleted the app everything went back to normal but that also makes me insecure and uncomfortable with other apps that I have because what if thatâ€™s happening towards me like it just happens with this app? I would not recommend this towards anyone because I donâ€™t want anybody that I recommended it to,to get their device hacked or haveThe same problems I was having with this app as well.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review:
I am very disappointed in the lack of respect that our president has towards the minority. He has called COVID-19 the â€œChina virusâ€ and has said that black people are â€œlow lives.â€ He is supposed to be our president, and with being the president you are supposed to lead and respect the citizens of your country but he does the exact opposite.   He has continuously proven that he is racist, homophobic, a hypocrite and also a sexual predator that has sexualized his own daughter in an interview. In the interview the man asked â€œ whatâ€™s your favorite thing about your daughterâ€ and he responded â€œ her legs.â€ Instead of saying something about her intelligence or her personality he compliments her physical appearance in her lower region. Iâ€™m astonished at how low Americaâ€™s standards have gone. I hope that we can escape this president and thrive with a president that believes in equality and respects the citizens of the United States, and who finally leads us into freedom and JUSTICE for all.

attributes.title: app ruined my life!
attributes.review: this app ruined my life. one night, around 11am, i was in my room, walking home, on my way to work! it was the fourth of july, around wintertime, during a thunderstorm, and i was stinky so i took a shower, in my sink, and then this app made my phone get up and jump inside the sink. so my grandma placed my phone on a towel, in canada, and then started to shake it so aggressively, it flow outside and got on the satellite dish, and landed in florida! when i found it, i was looking for it, eating canned beans. and my sister lost my phone, and gave it to me while trying to find it! sooner or later, i can control boys with my phone! and then my dogs birthday was coming up yesterday, and i wanted to give him a digital picture, so when i asked this app to draw it for me, they drew the picture in SPANISH! thats why i dont like michelle musso, speaking of musso, this app attracted mooses to my oos, like my oreos, which i was drinking. so i had to remove the moose and i removed the app after all this happened. so disapaointedğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”ğŸ’”

attributes.title: Do NOT download this app!
attributes.review: I was very excited to download the app and get more information about the upcoming election/our Presidentâ€™s campaign, but I was very dismayed by the results. Not only did it take about 6 days to download, but once I opened it I think it created some sort of virus on my device! I was getting infinite notifications and pop-ups asking for my location even though I continued to hit decline. After a while, all of the app icons on my phone were changed into the Trump logo, even the default Apple ones. Once I deleted the app, my phone battery was beginning to drain incredibly fast and wouldnâ€™t hold a charge. I even left it overnight to charge and my battery nearly burst into flames!! Besides that I have few other complaints, except that the app is incredibly ugly to look at, unintuitive, and cluttered. I hope no one else wastes their time trying to use this app and instead tries to use a rock for their information, as it will be much faster and accurate! Thank you

attributes.title: Worst decision ever
attributes.review: The very moment I tried to download this app my car caught on fire and exploded. Then when I went to go deal with that a swarm of locusts attacked me right when I stepped out the front door. After that I went back inside to see if my new app was done installing, my cat died right in front of my newborn toddler who was absolutely devastated. My husband then came home and immediately divorced me, claiming that I let some sort of voodoo magic take over our lives. I questioned what he meant by that when I received a phone call saying my credit card was compromised and I now owe the bank $40,000. Not used to seeing me in such a state of disarray, my toddler ran away from home, happy to be out of such a toxic environment. Alone and helpless, I fell to my knees asking God what I did to deserve this. Then I heard my phone ping that the app was done installing. I opened it up only to find one singular page that said, â€œMAGA: Make All Go Awayâ€ and then I died instantly 0/10 would rate 0 stars if possible
